image.prompt: A close-up, photorealistic portrait of a single baby tapir (tapir calf) with its distinct spotted and striped coat, nibbling on a leafy plant in a lush forest environment. The scene captures lifelike textures, realistic lighting, and the gentle expression of the calf. The environment is a natural, green backdrop with soft, warm light reminiscent of professional wildlife photography.
image.negative_prompt: multiple eyes, extra eyes, multiple heads, extra limbs, missing limbs, fused features, disproportionate anatomy, symmetrical errors, unnatural joints, overly smooth textures, low-quality rendering, floating body parts, painting, cartoonish, cgi, watermark, text, signature, unnatural poses, awkward jumps, deformed anatomy, blurred, disfigured, incomplete, symmetrical anomalies, cloned face, disembodied limbs
